welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Fairview, the charming city known for its picturesque landscapes and friendly community. We hope you enjoy your stay and take the time to explore all that our beautiful city has to offer."

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal for domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal for regional flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: The main terminal at Harrisburg International Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Harrisburg International Airport, primarily used for regional flights.

wifi.note: Complimentary Wi-Fi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at York Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at York Airport handles all cargo and freight operations.

wifi.note: Passengers can access free WiFi throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Lancaster Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Lancaster Airport handles all freight and cargo operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
